item.title: These Inspiring Women Each Raised 21 Puppies To Become Guide Dogs
item.description: In August, Debbie Scheblein and Bonnie Moore joined The Seeing Eye 21 Club for raising at least 21 puppies for the nonprofit guide dog school.
